page.title: 11TEENAGE SURVEY.(P1)
page.content:
COLLINGWOOD THIRD YEAR SURVEY Collingwood Third Year pupils with an average age of 14 completed the following survey,in July 1985.The aim of the survey was to discover the wealth and lifestyle of a typical pupil.295 surveys were completed and recorded.
1.How many cars does your family own?
A.NONE-7% B.1-30.5% C.2-47% D.3-10.5 E.MORE THAN 3-5%
2.Do you own a video and/or computer?
A.VIDEO ONLY-21% B.COMPUTER ONLY-20.5% C.BOTH-45% D.NEITHER-13% E.NO TV-0.5%
3.How many pets do you have? A.0-16%
B.1-25% C.2-19% D.3-14% E.3+-26%
